response.answer_text: Learning is essential to our existence. Just like food nourishes our bodies, information, and continued learning nourish our minds. Lifelong learning is an indispensable tool for every career and organization. ... Change in your career, change in your personal life, change in your community, and organizations. Today, continuous learning forms a necessary part in acquiring critical thinking skills and discovering new ways of relating to people from different cultures. To live a life without continuous learning is unthinkable. There are many ways of learning such as Visual, Auditory & Kinaesthetic (Learning while doing). Each has its own importance.  Benefits of learning in one’s Life Improve Your Self-Confidence. ...Fight Boredom. ...Keep Your Brain Healthy and Your Mind Sharp. ...Learn Practical Life Skills. ...Model Positive Behavior for Your Children. ...Learn for Leisure. ...Sleep More Soundly. ...Stay Healthy.Brings HappinessMakes life Easy going Learning is an ongoing process…it starts from the womb and ends to the Tomb How to learn something new every day: · Get into the habit of reading by scheduling your time. · Build a network of go-to experts and ask questions. · Become a member of an association related to your work and initiate networking. · Learn by teaching someone else. · Conduct your own research and investigations. · Go to the library and explore the shelves. · Observe what’s happening around you. · Evaluate and reflect on what you’ve learned. · Apply what you’ve learned. Resources for continued learning: · Read magazines and online articles. · Analyse and critique case studies. · Subscribe to publications specific to your areas of interest. · Make time to connect with a global network of people using Skype, Social Media, and Email.

Is interesting, as its answer may vary from person to person. However, the most effective answer would have to be that learning gives us the tools we need to improve our situation in life and to achieve success. For instance, the effectiveness of education can be seen in the many people who can successfully enter the labor market due to the proper education they received in school. They will have built skills and experience in managing their own time, time management and planning strategies. Therefore, the answer Why is learning important? Is important because it is a tool in our way to succeed in our daily lives. There are some reasons why learning can improve your life in general. For instance, when learning you get to know things that you don't usually learn, this provides insight into how things work and what's really important in life. Another benefit of learning is that once you are aware of the ways of the world, you can use them to improve the quality of your life. In other words, knowledge is power and a successful life is a life where one is an empowered human being. Learning helps you understand the present circumstances, thus you will be better equipped to handle the future challenges. One last benefit of learning is that when you learn things you are better able to learn from the mistakes you make in the future. This makes learning a self-fulfilling act which has great benefits in your life. When you keep learning, you are able to gain more knowledge is power!
